channel.title: PlayerhasItem help

item.title: PlayerhasItem help
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

Use this.

if(NPCID == 2024){ if(playerHasItem(423, 5)) { deleItem(423, 5); addItem(432, 1); toX = 111; toY = 111; sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(2024), 4884); sendFrame126("Thanks for the keys!", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886); sendFrame75(2024, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; }else{ if(playerHasItem(423, 0) && playerHasItem(423, 1) && playerHasItem(423, 2) && playerHasItem(423, 3)) { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(2024), 4884); sendFrame126("Come back then you have 4 keys", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886); sendFrame75(2024, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; } } }

copy the quoted information and use it

Read full topic

item.title: PlayerhasItem help
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You forgot to capitalize the last 3 “playerHasItem” statements, the H’s aren’t capitalized.

For future reference post your error to make it easier for us.

Read full topic

item.title: PlayerhasItem help
item.dc:creator: @batula batula
item.description:
@batula wrote:

Hey, just mvn with the tele -> i get error at playerHasItem why??

if(NPCID == 2024){ if(playerHasItem(423, 5)) { deleItem(423, 5); addItem(432, 1); toX = 111; toY = 111; sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(2024), 4884); sendFrame126("Thanks for the keys!", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886); sendFrame75(2024, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; }else{ if(playerHasItem(423, 0) && playerhasItem(423, 1) && playerhasItem(423, 2) && playerhasItem(423, 3)) { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(2024), 4884); sendFrame126("Come back then you have 4 keys", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886); sendFrame75(2024, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; } } }

Read full topic
